tossup_question: 21) CHEMISTRY  Reduction involves which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Gain of electrons and increase in oxidation number 
X) Loss of electrons and increase in oxidation number 
Y) Gain of electrons and decrease in oxidation number 
Z) Loss of electrons and decrease in oxidation number
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) Gain of electrons and decrease in oxidation number
bonus_question: 21) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following quantities increases with the addition of a catalyst?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Gibbs free energy 
X) Activation energy 
Y) Reaction rate
Z) Equilibrium constant
